overview_of_class: Basic definitions; Zeroth Law and the meaning of temperature; the First Law; the Second Law, entropy, and its applications; equations of state; the Third Law of Thermodynamics; and introduction to statistical thermodynamics.
name: Thermodynamics & Statistical Mechanics - I
subject: MECH_ENG
